sentences.english: Changning District is located in the west of downtown Shanghai and covers an area of 38 square km.
sentences.chinese: 长宁区位于上海市中心区西部，面积38平方公里。

sentences.english: Joy without sorrow, peace without pain.
Immediately, the construction project on the banks of Yujiang River began.
sentences.chinese: 随即，长宁开始了淯江河沿岸的治理工程。

sentences.english: Shanghai Mingbo Art Museum is located at Mo. 191, …
sentences.chinese: 上海名博美术馆坐落在长宁区宋园路191号。
